title: Highest Binding Coverage for Primary Products
description: In 2022, Grenada achieved a binding coverage of 100% for primary products, indicating full tariff binding commitments in this category.

title: Lowest Net ODA Received per Capita
description: In 2022, Grenada had a net ODA received per capita of -800.94 USD, indicating a negative net official development assistance per person.

title: Lowest Net ODA Received as Percentage of GNI
description: Grenada recorded a net ODA received of -8.19% of its GNI in 2022, reflecting a negative net official development assistance relative to its gross national income.

title: Lowest Net ODA Received as Percentage of Imports
description: In 2022, Grenada's net ODA received was -10.49% of its imports of goods, services, and primary income, indicating a negative net official development assistance relative to its imports.
